content: This is a beautiful and inspiring piece, Kitten Holiday and I have to confess it’s made me think. I am the original “no fucks given” girl — I love freely but I don’t commit. No drama, no rules, no hassle. And this is the first thing I’ve ever read that’s made me question my choices… for a moment, at least! You make the alternative sound less like a punishment and more like a prize. Great read.
